originalText.text:
I absolutely LOVE Beau Eyelash Studio! ‚ù§Ô∏è I‚Äôve done the classic (80 and 100 pieces), extra full (130 lashes) and the double 2D services, and every single set is amazing. Each technician has done a fantastic job - my lashes last at least 4 weeks and everyone always comments on how good they look üòç

I‚Äôve tried so many other lash studios in Manhattan, Hoboken and Jersey City, and this is by far the best in terms of quality, price and service. They are so friendly and accommodating - I‚Äôm now at the point in my pregnancy when I can longer be on my back, and they give me pillows to support me while I lie on my side during the appointment ü•π. I can‚Äôt recommend Beau Eyelash Studio enough - both the UES & UWS locations!!

originalText.text: I had such a wonderful experience here for a lash lift. It was very relaxing and went by so quickly. I‚Äôd definitely come here again over Bespoke Brows around the corner.

originalText.text: Love it, the eyelashes look beautiful. The staff is courteous and they were really nice. Definitely recommend

originalText.text:
Fabulous place. I highly recommend Nicole
Very professional: on time , clean and really kind people
Lots of styles. I picked natural 7-10mm and they last for 2 months min!!!

originalText.text:
After reading reviews, this place did not exceed my expectations. Had an appointment at 1:30pm for a lash lift and tint, was checked in right away but it didn‚Äôt start until 1:40pm. Nothing was being communicated with how long or even whether it was okay to wear contacts or not.

When I was seen by the technician, she was really nice and even informed me that I wasn‚Äôt going to need a tint since my lashes were dark already. After that she proceeded to show me 2 pictures on whether I wanted a C shape lash or an L shape. Didn‚Äôt know which one would fit me better, wish she would have explained or even recommend rather than just show me pictures. But I ended up going with C and I‚Äôm not really happy with them because they do look a bit short and I have LONG lashes. Plus it‚Äôs only been 4 days and they look like they‚Äôre already falling.

Lastly, when I was paying, paid in cash cause reviews said they give discounts if you do. However, I didn‚Äôt receive any type of discounts they charged me $75 for a lash lift. The person charging me was giving me a bit of attitude and even asked me if I was going to leave anything for the technician. Which I told her that I gave my tip to the technician already and she quickly changed her tone. Working in the service industry, I make sure to always tip but I always remember that tipping is not always guaranteed and I just found that unpleasant. Will definitely find a new place to get my lashes done.

When I was seen by the technician, she was really nice and even informed me that I wasn‚Äôt going to need a tint since my lashes were dark already. After that she proceeded to show me 2 pictures on whether I wanted a C shape lash or an L shape. Didn‚Äôt know which one would fit me better, wish she would have explained or even recommend rather than just show me pictures. But I ended up going with C and I‚Äôm not really happy with them because they do look a bit short and I have LONG lashes. Plus it‚Äôs only been 4 days and they look like they‚Äôre already falling.

Will definitely find a new place to get my lashes done.
